qas.question: What document granted sovereignty to the Marshall Islands?
In what year did the Marshall Islands receive sovereignty?
Where in the Marshall Islands does the United States have a missile testing range?
When did UN Trusteeship over the Marshall Islands end?
What Security Council Resolution ended UN Trusteeship over the Marshalls?

context: In <a1_0>1986<a1_0/>, <a0_0>the Compact of Free Association<a0_0/> with the United States entered into force, granting the Republic of the Marshall Islands (RMI) its sovereignty. The Compact provided for aid and U.S. defense of the islands in exchange for continued U.S. military use of the missile testing range at <a2_0>Kwajalein Atoll<a2_0/>. The independence procedure was formally completed under international law in <a3_0>1990<a3_0/>, when the UN officially ended the Trusteeship status pursuant to <a4_0>Security Council Resolution 683<a4_0/>.
